ud4.10:1.3: Now at that time Venerable Sāriputta was sitting not far from the Buddha cross-legged, with his body straight, reviewing his own peacefulness.
ud4.10:2.1: The Buddha saw him meditating there.
ud4.10:3.1: Then, knowing the meaning of this, on that occasion the Buddha expressed this heartfelt sentiment:
